    • Method Detail

      • assess

        public static java.util.List<DrugUserSuitability> assess(NewAssessmentForm form,
                                                         UserRepository userRepo,
                                                         IllnessRepository illnessRepo,
                                                         DrugRepository drugRepo,
                                                         DataAccessObject dao,
                                                         IncidentRepository incidentRepo,
                                                         EffectRepository effectRepo,
                                                         AssessmentRepository assessmentRepo)
        Encapsulates the logic for assessing a patients suitability for a set of drugs. This method will retrieve all required data from the database, convert it into the classification model and then call the Classification4J.classifyWithProbabilties method to generate the probabilities that the patient will experience any of the side effects recorded so far for the set of drugs.
        Parameters:
        form - The NewAssessmentForm
        userRepo - The UserReposity for accessing User data.
        illnessRepo - The IllnessRepority for accessing Illness data.
        drugRepo - The DrugReposity for accessing Drug data.
        dao - The DataAccessObject for performing custom data access operations.
        incidentRepo - The IncidentRepository for accessing Incident data.
        effectRepo - The EffectRepository for accessing Effect data.
        assessmentRepo - The AssessmentRepository for accessing Assessment data.
        Returns:
        A list of generated DrugUserSuitability objects, which represent the probabilities that a user will experience various side effects.
